item.title: Release always, even partial features
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Release always, even partial features Have you wondered what to do when a feature takes more time than the Introduction In this post I will tell an early in my career story when I first learned that the release of anything is always better than release nothing. Death march Agility Conclusion I have described a situation where a feature could not be released but instead of blocking the full feature, I decided to release a partial version of the feature.
